00051 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00052  * @brief Convert the pin number of GPIO to the channel of EXTI.
00053  * @param n: can be 0, 1 to 15 to select the pin number of GPIO.
00054  ************************************************************************************************************/
00055 #if (LIBCFG_EXTI_8CH)
00056   #define  GPIO2EXTI(n)                             ((n >= 8) ? (n - 8) : n)
00057 #else
00058   #define  GPIO2EXTI(n)                             (n)
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 #define  EXTI_GetIRQn(ch)                           gEXTIn_IRQn[ch]
00062 /**
00063   * @}
00064   */
00065 
00066 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00067 /** @defgroup EXTI_Exported_Types EXTI exported types
00068   * @{
00069   */
00070 
00071 /* Definitions of EXTI interrupt line                                                                       */
00072 typedef enum
00073 {
00074   EXTI_CHANNEL_0 = 0,
00075   EXTI_CHANNEL_1,
00076   EXTI_CHANNEL_2,
00077   EXTI_CHANNEL_3,
00078   EXTI_CHANNEL_4,
00079   EXTI_CHANNEL_5,
00080   EXTI_CHANNEL_6,
00081   EXTI_CHANNEL_7,
00082 #if (!LIBCFG_EXTI_8CH)
00083   EXTI_CHANNEL_8,
00084   EXTI_CHANNEL_9,
00085   EXTI_CHANNEL_10,
00086   EXTI_CHANNEL_11,
00087   EXTI_CHANNEL_12,
00088   EXTI_CHANNEL_13,
00089   EXTI_CHANNEL_14,
00090   EXTI_CHANNEL_15,
00091 #endif
00092 } EXTI_Channel_TypeDef;
00093 
00094 #if (LIBCFG_EXTI_8CH)
00095 #define IS_CHANNEL_8(x)                             (0)
00096 #define IS_CHANNEL_9(x)                             (0)
00097 #define IS_CHANNEL_10(x)                            (0)
00098 #define IS_CHANNEL_11(x)                            (0)
00099 #define IS_CHANNEL_12(x)                            (0)
00100 #define IS_CHANNEL_13(x)                            (0)
00101 #define IS_CHANNEL_14(x)                            (0)
00102 #define IS_CHANNEL_15(x)                            (0)
00103 #else
00104 #define IS_CHANNEL_8(x)                             (x == EXTI_CHANNEL_8)
00105 #define IS_CHANNEL_9(x)                             (x == EXTI_CHANNEL_9)
00106 #define IS_CHANNEL_10(x)                            (x == EXTI_CHANNEL_10)
00107 #define IS_CHANNEL_11(x)                            (x == EXTI_CHANNEL_11)
00108 #define IS_CHANNEL_12(x)                            (x == EXTI_CHANNEL_12)
00109 #define IS_CHANNEL_13(x)                            (x == EXTI_CHANNEL_13)
00110 #define IS_CHANNEL_14(x)                            (x == EXTI_CHANNEL_14)
00111 #define IS_CHANNEL_15(x)                            (x == EXTI_CHANNEL_15)
00112 #endif
00113 
00114 
00115 #define IS_EXTI_CHANNEL(CHANNEL)                    ((CHANNEL == EXTI_CHANNEL_0) || \
00116                                                      (CHANNEL == EXTI_CHANNEL_1) || \
00117                                                      (CHANNEL == EXTI_CHANNEL_2) || \
00118                                                      (CHANNEL == EXTI_CHANNEL_3) || \
00119                                                      (CHANNEL == EXTI_CHANNEL_4) || \
00120                                                      (CHANNEL == EXTI_CHANNEL_5) || \
00121                                                      (CHANNEL == EXTI_CHANNEL_6) || \
00122                                                      (CHANNEL == EXTI_CHANNEL_7) || \
00123                                                      IS_CHANNEL_8(CHANNEL) || \
00124                                                      IS_CHANNEL_9(CHANNEL) || \
00125                                                      IS_CHANNEL_10(CHANNEL) || \
00126                                                      IS_CHANNEL_11(CHANNEL) || \
00127                                                      IS_CHANNEL_12(CHANNEL) || \
00128                                                      IS_CHANNEL_13(CHANNEL) || \
00129                                                      IS_CHANNEL_14(CHANNEL) || \
00130                                                      IS_CHANNEL_15(CHANNEL))

00133 /* Definitions of EXTI init structure                                                                       */
00134 typedef enum
00135 {
00136   EXTI_LOW_LEVEL     = 0x0,
00137   EXTI_HIGH_LEVEL    = 0x1,
00138   EXTI_NEGATIVE_EDGE = 0x2,
00139   EXTI_POSITIVE_EDGE = 0x3,
00140   EXTI_BOTH_EDGE     = 0x4
00141 } EXTI_Interrupt_TypeDef;
00142 
00143 #define IS_EXTI_INT_TYPE(TYPE)                      ((TYPE == EXTI_LOW_LEVEL) || \
00144                                                      (TYPE == EXTI_HIGH_LEVEL) || \
00145                                                      (TYPE == EXTI_NEGATIVE_EDGE) || \
00146                                                      (TYPE == EXTI_POSITIVE_EDGE) || \
00147                                                      (TYPE == EXTI_BOTH_EDGE))
00148 
00149 typedef enum
00150 {
00151   EXTI_DEBOUNCE_DISABLE = 0x0,
00152   EXTI_DEBOUNCE_ENABLE  = 0x1
00153 } EXTI_Deb_TypeDef;
00154 
00155 #define IS_EXTI_DEBOUNCE_TYPE(TYPE)                 ((TYPE == EXTI_DEBOUNCE_DISABLE) || \
00156                                                      (TYPE == EXTI_DEBOUNCE_ENABLE))
00157 
00158 #if (LIBCFG_EXTI_DEBCNTPRE)
00159 typedef enum
00160 {
00161   EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV1   = 0,
00162   EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV2,
00163   EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV4,
00164   EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV8,
00165   EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV16,
00166   EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV32,
00167   EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV64,
00168   EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV128,
00169 } EXTI_DebCntPre_TypeDef;
00170 
00171 #define IS_EXTI_DEBOUNCE_COUNTER_PRESCALER(TYPE)    ((TYPE == EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV1) || \
00172                                                      (TYPE == EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV2) || \
00173                                                      (TYPE == EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV4) || \
00174                                                      (TYPE == EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV8) || \
00175                                                      (TYPE == EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV16) || \
00176                                                      (TYPE == EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV32) || \
00177                                                      (TYPE == EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV64) || \
00178                                                      (TYPE == EXTI_DBCNTPRE_DIV128))
00179 #endif
00180 
00181 typedef struct
00182 {
00183   u32 EXTI_Channel;
00184   EXTI_Deb_TypeDef EXTI_Debounce;
00185   #if (LIBCFG_EXTI_8BIT_DEBOUNCE_COUNTER)
00186   u8 EXTI_DebounceCnt;
00187   #else
00188   u16 EXTI_DebounceCnt;
00189   #endif
00190   EXTI_Interrupt_TypeDef EXTI_IntType;
00191 } EXTI_InitTypeDef;

00193   * @}

00201 /* Definitions of EXTI wake up polarity                                                                     */
00202 #define EXTI_WAKEUP_HIGH_LEVEL                      ((u8)0x0)
00203 #define EXTI_WAKEUP_LOW_LEVEL                       ((u8)0x1)
00204 
00205 #define IS_EXTI_WAKEUP_TYPE(TYPE)                   ((TYPE == EXTI_WAKEUP_HIGH_LEVEL) || \
00206                                                      (TYPE == EXTI_WAKEUP_LOW_LEVEL))
00207 
00208 
00209 #define EXTI_EDGE_POSITIVE                          ((u8)0x0)
00210 #define EXTI_EDGE_NEGATIVE                          ((u8)0x1)
00211 
00212 #define IS_EXTI_EDGE(EDGE)                          ((EDGE == EXTI_EDGE_POSITIVE) || \
00213                                                      (EDGE == EXTI_EDGE_NEGATIVE))
00214 
00215 #if (LIBCFG_EXTI_8BIT_DEBOUNCE_COUNTER)
00216 #define IS_EXTI_DEBOUNCE_SIZE(SIZE)                 (SIZE <= 0xFF)
00217 #else
00218 #define IS_EXTI_DEBOUNCE_SIZE(SIZE)                 (SIZE <= 0xFFFF)
00219 #endif
00220 
00221 extern const IRQn_Type gEXTIn_IRQn[16];

00224   * @}
